column5: Headed there tuesday for 3 weeks. Talked to dad last night and he said they were rolling on the beach. Cant freakin wait!!!

Thanks Bud  That sure brought back some good memories. We would be in the water just tossing/flinging them up on the rock shore and me nan and parents would pick them up. Never used a net or anything, just our bare hands.LOL

Been fortunate to have had a chance to hang with some local fellas in Deer Lake who were so accommodating sharing the capelin and boil up experiences. Such a warm and friendly bunch that would add a bright spot to anyone's life. Ive been lucky to visit there twice and hope to add a few more down the road.
We use a cast net and a dip net. Sometimes they stay just off shore so you have to use the cast net. Some guys make throwing the net look easy!
Im talking about 42 years ago. LOL
You would have made a killing with the toon and Terry!
You would have made a killing with the toon and Terry!  I would give it a go forsure. Rowing the toon with a net dragging. LOL
Use the drill thingy! You B, are a McGiver! I'll  try to make it up  your way, My daughter spends more time here than in Innisfil.
